name: Article 691 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The scope of the guarantee includes the principal claim and its interest, default, damages and the costs of realizing the claim.
text:
Name:Article 691 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The scope of the guarantee includes the principal claim and its interest, default, damages and the costs of realizing the claim.

name: Article 514 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The creditor may request the debtor to perform in the legal currency of the place of actual performance, unless otherwise provided by law or agreed by the parties.
text:
Name:Article 514 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The creditor may request the debtor to perform in the legal currency of the place of actual performance, unless otherwise provided by law or agreed by the parties.

name: Article 17 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If either party does not wish to divorce within thirty days of the date on which the marriage registration office receives the application for registration of divorce, it may withdraw the application for registration of divorce from the marriage registry office.
text:
Name:Article 17 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If either party does not wish to divorce within thirty days of the date on which the marriage registration office receives the application for registration of divorce, it may withdraw the application for registration of divorce from the marriage registry office.

name: Article 964 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: An intermediary may not request compensation if it has not contributed to the establishment of the contract; however, the client may be requested to pay the necessary expenses to engage in brokering activities as agreed.
text:
Name:Article 964 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:An intermediary may not request compensation if it has not contributed to the establishment of the contract; however, the client may be requested to pay the necessary expenses to engage in brokering activities as agreed.

name: Article 920 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The principal may, inter alia, entrust the trustee with one or more matters, or may generally entrust the trustee with all matters.
text:
Name:Article 920 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The principal may, inter alia, entrust the trustee with one or more matters, or may generally entrust the trustee with all matters.

name: Article 748 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Article 672 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The borrower shall provide the lender with financial accounting statements or other information on a regular basis, as agreed.
text:
Name:Article 672 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The borrower shall provide the lender with financial accounting statements or other information on a regular basis, as agreed.

name: Article 16 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the perpetrator causes damage to the civil rights and interests of others, regardless of the perpetrator ' s fault, the law provides for liability for the tort, in accordance with its provisions.
text:
Name:Article 16 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the perpetrator causes damage to the civil rights and interests of others, regardless of the perpetrator ' s fault, the law provides for liability for the tort, in accordance with its provisions.

name: Article 641 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the parties may agree in the contract of sale that the buyer has failed to perform the price or other obligations, the ownership of the subject matter belongs to the seller. n The ownership of the subject matter retained by the seller is not registered against bona fide third parties. n
text:
Name:Article 641 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the parties may agree in the contract of sale that the buyer has failed to perform the price or other obligations, the ownership of the subject matter belongs to the seller. n The ownership of the subject matter retained by the seller is not registered against bona fide third parties. n

name: Article 989 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: This Part regulates civil relations arising from the enjoyment and protection of the right to personality.
text:
Name:Article 989 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:This Part regulates civil relations arising from the enjoyment and protection of the right to personality.

name: Article 213 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Article 528 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the parties suspend performance in accordance with the preceding article, they shall notify the other party promptly. If the other party provides appropriate security, the performance shall be resumed. If, after the suspension, the other party fails to restore its capacity to perform within a reasonable period of time and does not provide adequate security, it shall be deemed to have demonstrated, by its own conduct, a failure to perform the primary obligation, and the party whose performance is suspended may discharge the contract and may request the other party to assume responsibility for the breach.
text:
Name:Article 528 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the parties suspend performance in accordance with the preceding article, they shall notify the other party promptly. If the other party provides appropriate security, the performance shall be resumed. If, after the suspension, the other party fails to restore its capacity to perform within a reasonable period of time and does not provide adequate security, it shall be deemed to have demonstrated, by its own conduct, a failure to perform the primary obligation, and the party whose performance is suspended may discharge the contract and may request the other party to assume responsibility for the breach.

name: Article 524 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the debtor fails to perform the obligation, and the third party has a legitimate interest in the performance of the obligation, the third party is entitled to perform on behalf of the creditor, except in cases where, by the nature of the obligation, as agreed by the parties or as provided by law, the debtor can only perform. \n \n creditors accept performance by the third party, their claims against the debtor are assigned to the third party, unless otherwise agreed between the debtor and the third party.
text:
Name:Article 524 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the debtor fails to perform the obligation, and the third party has a legitimate interest in the performance of the obligation, the third party is entitled to perform on behalf of the creditor, except in cases where, by the nature of the obligation, as agreed by the parties or as provided by law, the debtor can only perform. \n \n creditors accept performance by the third party, their claims against the debtor are assigned to the third party, unless otherwise agreed between the debtor and the third party.

name: Article 654 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The electrician may suspend the electricity supply in accordance with the procedure laid down by the state. If the electric user is late in paying the electricity bill, the default payment shall be made in accordance with the agreement. If the electric operator fails to pay the electricity charge and default payment within a reasonable period of time, the electrician may suspend the electricity supply in accordance with the procedure established by the state.
text:
Name:Article 654 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The electrician may suspend the electricity supply in accordance with the procedure laid down by the state. If the electric user is late in paying the electricity bill, the default payment shall be made in accordance with the agreement. If the electric operator fails to pay the electricity charge and default payment within a reasonable period of time, the electrician may suspend the electricity supply in accordance with the procedure established by the state.

name: Article 910 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A warehouse receipt is a certificate of extraction of the warehouse.
text:
Name:Article 910 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A warehouse receipt is a certificate of extraction of the warehouse.

name: Article 939 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The pre-property service contracts entered into by the construction unit with the property service provider in accordance with the law, as well as the property service contracts entered into by the proprietor ' s committee with the property service provider selected by the proprietor ' s assembly in accordance with the law, are legally binding on the owner.
text:
Name:Article 939 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The pre-property service contracts entered into by the construction unit with the property service provider in accordance with the law, as well as the property service contracts entered into by the proprietor ' s committee with the property service provider selected by the proprietor ' s assembly in accordance with the law, are legally binding on the owner.

name: Article 383 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The easement is legally binding on the transferee if part of the transfer relates to easements, as well as part of the transfer of the right to contract land on the place of use and the right to use the land for construction.
text:
Name:Article 383 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The easement is legally binding on the transferee if part of the transfer relates to easements, as well as part of the transfer of the right to contract land on the place of use and the right to use the land for construction.

name: Article 10112 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A natural person shall have the right to a name and the right to determine, use, change or permit by law the use of his or her name, provided that it is not contrary to public order.
text:
Name:Article 10112 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A natural person shall have the right to a name and the right to determine, use, change or permit by law the use of his or her name, provided that it is not contrary to public order.

name: Article 517 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
If the creditor is two or more persons, the target is assigned to each share of the claim, and the debtor is two or more persons, the target is assigned to each share of the debt, and the share of the debt is assigned to each share. 
 
 is considered to be the same as the share of the creditor or of the debtor, which is difficult to determine.
text:
Name:Article 517 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the creditor is two or more persons, the target is assigned to each share of the claim, and the debtor is two or more persons, the target is assigned to each share of the debt, and the share of the debt is assigned to each share. 
 
 is considered to be the same as the share of the creditor or of the debtor, which is difficult to determine.

name: Article 1,999 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Tortual liability shall be incurred by a person who has no civil capacity to attend a kindergarten, school or other educational institution during the course of his or her studies and life; however, tort liability shall not be incurred if he or she can prove that he or she has fulfilled his or her educational and managerial responsibilities.
text:
Name:Article 1,999 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Tortual liability shall be incurred by a person who has no civil capacity to attend a kindergarten, school or other educational institution during the course of his or her studies and life; however, tort liability shall not be incurred if he or she can prove that he or she has fulfilled his or her educational and managerial responsibilities.

name: Article 870 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The licensor of a technology transfer contract and the licensor of a technology licence contract shall ensure that it is the legal owner of the technology provided and that the technology provided is complete, correct and effective and capable of achieving the agreed objectives.
text:
Name:Article 870 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The licensor of a technology transfer contract and the licensor of a technology licence contract shall ensure that it is the legal owner of the technology provided and that the technology provided is complete, correct and effective and capable of achieving the agreed objectives.

name: Article 208 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The establishment, alteration, transfer and extinction of real property rights shall be registered in accordance with the law.
text:
Name:Article 208 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The establishment, alteration, transfer and extinction of real property rights shall be registered in accordance with the law.

name: Article 9114 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the parties have not agreed or have not agreed on the duration of the storage, the inventory holder or the warehouse receipt holder may withdraw the stock at any time and the custodian may request the inventory holder or the warehouse receipt holder to withdraw the stock at any time, provided that the necessary lead time is given.
text:
Name:Article 9114 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the parties have not agreed or have not agreed on the duration of the storage, the inventory holder or the warehouse receipt holder may withdraw the stock at any time and the custodian may request the inventory holder or the warehouse receipt holder to withdraw the stock at any time, provided that the necessary lead time is given.

name: Article 268 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The State, collective and private may, in accordance with the law, finance the establishment of limited liability companies, joint companies or other enterprises.
text:
Name:Article 268 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The State, collective and private may, in accordance with the law, finance the establishment of limited liability companies, joint companies or other enterprises.

name: Article 1256 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the public road manager fails to prove that the obligation to clean, protect, warn, etc. has been fulfilled, he shall bear the responsibility accordingly.
text:
Name:Article 1256 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the public road manager fails to prove that the obligation to clean, protect, warn, etc. has been fulfilled, he shall bear the responsibility accordingly.

name: Article 1083 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Upon divorce, a man and a woman who voluntarily resume their marriage relationship shall re-register their marriage at the marriage registry office.
text:
Name:Article 1083 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Upon divorce, a man and a woman who voluntarily resume their marriage relationship shall re-register their marriage at the marriage registry office.

name: Article 476 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
text:
Name:Article 476 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:An offer may be set aside except in the following cases: 

(i) where the offeror determines that the period of the undertaking or other form of an express offer is irrevocable; 

(ii) where the offeree has reason to believe that the offer is irrevocable and has made reasonable preparatory work for the performance of the contract.

name: Article 789 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The construction contract shall be in writing.
text:
Name:Article 789 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The construction contract shall be in writing.

name: Article 214 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The creation, alteration, transfer and extinguishment of real property rights shall be registered in accordance with the law and shall take effect from the time they are recorded in the register of immovable property.
text:
Name:Article 214 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The creation, alteration, transfer and extinguishment of real property rights shall be registered in accordance with the law and shall take effect from the time they are recorded in the register of immovable property.

name: Article 45 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The people ' s court shall revoke the declaration of disappearance if the disappeared person has reappeared, at the request of himself or of the interested person.
text:
Name:Article 45 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The people ' s court shall revoke the declaration of disappearance if the disappeared person has reappeared, at the request of himself or of the interested person.

name: Article 781 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the work delivered by the carrier does not meet the quality requirements, the contractor may reasonably choose to request the carrier to assume responsibility for breach of contract for repair, rework, reduction of remuneration, damages, etc.
text:
Name:Article 781 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the work delivered by the carrier does not meet the quality requirements, the contractor may reasonably choose to request the carrier to assume responsibility for breach of contract for repair, rework, reduction of remuneration, damages, etc.

name: Article 903 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The depositary has a right of retention in the custody if the depositary has not paid the custodial fee or other expenses as agreed, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
text:
Name:Article 903 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The depositary has a right of retention in the custody if the depositary has not paid the custodial fee or other expenses as agreed, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.

name: Article 38 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: After the guardian ' s parents or children have been removed from their status by the people ' s court, except for intentional crimes committed against the guardian, there is a genuine manifestation of remorse. Upon their application, the people ' s court may, subject to the genuine will of the guardian, restore the guardian ' s status, as appropriate, and the guardian appointed by the people ' s court terminates the guardianship relationship with the ward.
text:
Name:Article 38 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:After the guardian ' s parents or children have been removed from their status by the people ' s court, except for intentional crimes committed against the guardian, there is a genuine manifestation of remorse. Upon their application, the people ' s court may, subject to the genuine will of the guardian, restore the guardian ' s status, as appropriate, and the guardian appointed by the people ' s court terminates the guardianship relationship with the ward.

name: Article 652 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The electrician shall notify the electrician in advance, in accordance with the relevant provisions of the State, if he or she is required to interrupt his or her power supply for reasons such as planned repair of the power supply, temporary overhaul, restriction of electricity in accordance with the law or illegal use of electricity by the electric user; he or she shall be liable for any damage caused to the electric user by the interruption of his or her power supply without prior notice.
text:
Name:Article 652 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The electrician shall notify the electrician in advance, in accordance with the relevant provisions of the State, if he or she is required to interrupt his or her power supply for reasons such as planned repair of the power supply, temporary overhaul, restriction of electricity in accordance with the law or illegal use of electricity by the electric user; he or she shall be liable for any damage caused to the electric user by the interruption of his or her power supply without prior notice.

name: Article 127 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The law provides for the protection of data, virtual property on the Internet and in accordance with its provisions.
text:
Name:Article 127 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The law provides for the protection of data, virtual property on the Internet and in accordance with its provisions.

name: Article 661 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A gift may be accompanied by an obligation. If a gift is accompanied by an obligation, the recipient shall perform the obligation as agreed.
text:
Name:Article 661 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A gift may be accompanied by an obligation. If a gift is accompanied by an obligation, the recipient shall perform the obligation as agreed.

name: Article 84 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Holding funders, de facto controllers, directors, supervisors and senior managers of profit-making legal persons shall not use their association to the detriment of the interests of the legal person; they shall be liable if they use the association to cause loss to the legal person.
text:
Name:Article 84 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Holding funders, de facto controllers, directors, supervisors and senior managers of profit-making legal persons shall not use their association to the detriment of the interests of the legal person; they shall be liable if they use the association to cause loss to the legal person.

name: Article 53 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A person whose declaration of death has been revoked shall have the right to request the return of property from the civilian subject of the property acquired in accordance with Title VI of this Law; where such return is not possible, appropriate compensation shall be paid.
text:
Name:Article 53 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A person whose declaration of death has been revoked shall have the right to request the return of property from the civilian subject of the property acquired in accordance with Title VI of this Law; where such return is not possible, appropriate compensation shall be paid.

name: Article 10,116 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If a natural person decides, changes his or her name, or if a legal person or an illegal person ' s organization decides, changes or transfers his or her name, he or she shall, in accordance with the law, register with the relevant authority, unless otherwise provided by law.
text:
Name:Article 10,116 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If a natural person decides, changes his or her name, or if a legal person or an illegal person ' s organization decides, changes or transfers his or her name, he or she shall, in accordance with the law, register with the relevant authority, unless otherwise provided by law.

name: Article 15 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Spouses have equal status in the marital family.
text:
Name:Article 15 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Spouses have equal status in the marital family.

name: Article 551 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The debtor shall transfer all or part of the debt to a third person with the consent of the creditor. 
 
 The debtor or a third person may call upon the creditor to agree within a reasonable period of time and if the creditor has not indicated that it does not consent.
text:
Name:Article 551 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The debtor shall transfer all or part of the debt to a third person with the consent of the creditor. 
 
 The debtor or a third person may call upon the creditor to agree within a reasonable period of time and if the creditor has not indicated that it does not consent.

name: Article 289 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Laws and regulations regulate the handling of neighbouring relations, in accordance with their provisions; laws and regulations are not provided for and may be in accordance with local customs.
text:
Name:Article 289 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Laws and regulations regulate the handling of neighbouring relations, in accordance with their provisions; laws and regulations are not provided for and may be in accordance with local customs.

name: Article 447 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the debtor fails to perform its mature debt, the creditor may retain the movable property of the debtor, which is already lawfully in possession, and has the right to be paid in priority in respect of the movable property.
text:
Name:Article 447 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the debtor fails to perform its mature debt, the creditor may retain the movable property of the debtor, which is already lawfully in possession, and has the right to be paid in priority in respect of the movable property.

name: Article 718 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the lessor knew or should have known that the lessee had subleased, but had not objected within six months, it would be deemed to have agreed to sublease.
text:
Name:Article 718 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the lessor knew or should have known that the lessee had subleased, but had not objected within six months, it would be deemed to have agreed to sublease.

name: Article 124 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A natural person shall have the right to inherit in accordance with the law. n Legal private property of a natural person may be inherited in accordance with the law.
text:
Name:Article 124 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A natural person shall have the right to inherit in accordance with the law. n Legal private property of a natural person may be inherited in accordance with the law.

name: Article 624 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the seller delivers the subject matter to a third party on the instructions of the buyer, the test agreed upon by the seller and the buyer is inconsistent with the test agreed upon by the buyer and the third party, subject to the test agreed upon by the seller and the buyer.
text:
Name:Article 624 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the seller delivers the subject matter to a third party on the instructions of the buyer, the test agreed upon by the seller and the buyer is inconsistent with the test agreed upon by the buyer and the third party, subject to the test agreed upon by the seller and the buyer.

name: Article 11,180 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In the event of multiple deaths as a result of the same violation, compensation for death may be determined in the same amount.
text:
Name:Article 11,180 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:In the event of multiple deaths as a result of the same violation, compensation for death may be determined in the same amount.

name: Article 1114 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The adopter may not dissolve the adoption relationship until the adopter has reached the age of majority, except when the adopter and the adopter have agreed to do so. If the adopter is over eight years of age, he or she must give his or her consent.
text:
Name:Article 1114 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The adopter may not dissolve the adoption relationship until the adopter has reached the age of majority, except when the adopter and the adopter have agreed to do so. If the adopter is over eight years of age, he or she must give his or her consent.

name: Article 89 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The legal representative of a legal person in a business establishment shall be elected in accordance with the law, the administrative regulations or the statute of the legal person, unless otherwise provided by law.
text:
Name:Article 89 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The legal representative of a legal person in a business establishment shall be elected in accordance with the law, the administrative regulations or the statute of the legal person, unless otherwise provided by law.

name: Article 12 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the infringer intentionally pollutes the environment and destroys the ecology in violation of the law with serious consequences, the infringer has the right to request the corresponding punitive damages.
text:
Name:Article 12 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the infringer intentionally pollutes the environment and destroys the ecology in violation of the law with serious consequences, the infringer has the right to request the corresponding punitive damages.

name: Article 856 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A party to a cooperative development contract shall be liable for breach of contract if its research or development has stalled, delayed or failed in breach of the agreement.
text:
Name:Article 856 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A party to a cooperative development contract shall be liable for breach of contract if its research or development has stalled, delayed or failed in breach of the agreement.

name: Article 605 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If, for the buyer ' s reasons, the subject matter has not been delivered within the agreed time period, the buyer shall assume the risk of damage and loss of the subject matter from the time of the breach.
text:
Name:Article 605 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If, for the buyer ' s reasons, the subject matter has not been delivered within the agreed time period, the buyer shall assume the risk of damage and loss of the subject matter from the time of the breach.

name: Article 556 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Where rights and obligations under the contract are assigned together, the relevant provisions governing assignment of claims and transfer of debt apply.
text:
Name:Article 556 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Where rights and obligations under the contract are assigned together, the relevant provisions governing assignment of claims and transfer of debt apply.

name: Article 929 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In the case of a paid trust contract, the principal may seek compensation for the loss of the principal if the loss was caused by the fault of the trustee. In the case of a free-of-charge trust contract where the loss of the client was caused by wilful or gross negligence of the trustee, the principal may request compensation for the loss.
text:
Name:Article 929 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:In the case of a paid trust contract, the principal may seek compensation for the loss of the principal if the loss was caused by the fault of the trustee. In the case of a free-of-charge trust contract where the loss of the client was caused by wilful or gross negligence of the trustee, the principal may request compensation for the loss.

name: Article 1106 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: When the adoption relationship is established, the public security organs shall register the adoptee in accordance with the relevant provisions of the State.
text:
Name:Article 1106 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:When the adoption relationship is established, the public security organs shall register the adoptee in accordance with the relevant provisions of the State.

name: Article 626 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The buyer shall pay the price in accordance with the amount and manner of payment agreed upon. If there is no agreement on the amount and mode of payment or the agreement is unclear, the provisions of articles 510, 51 (2) and 5 of this Law shall apply.
text:
Name:Article 626 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The buyer shall pay the price in accordance with the amount and manner of payment agreed upon. If there is no agreement on the amount and mode of payment or the agreement is unclear, the provisions of articles 510, 51 (2) and 5 of this Law shall apply.

name: Article 669 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: To enter into a borrowing contract, the borrower shall, upon request of the lender, provide a factual picture of the business activities and financial position associated with the borrowing.
text:
Name:Article 669 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:To enter into a borrowing contract, the borrower shall, upon request of the lender, provide a factual picture of the business activities and financial position associated with the borrowing.

name: Article 277 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The owner may set up a general meeting of owners and elect a committee of owners. Specific conditions and procedures for the establishment of a general meeting of owners and a committee of owners shall be prescribed by law and by statute.
text:
Name:Article 277 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The owner may set up a general meeting of owners and elect a committee of owners. Specific conditions and procedures for the establishment of a general meeting of owners and a committee of owners shall be prescribed by law and by statute.

name: Article 96 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The legal entities specified in this section, the members of the collective economic organizations of rural areas, the members of the cooperative economic organizations of urban and rural areas, and the members of the organizations of popular self-government at the grass-roots level are special legal persons.
text:
Name:Article 96 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The legal entities specified in this section, the members of the collective economic organizations of rural areas, the members of the cooperative economic organizations of urban and rural areas, and the members of the organizations of popular self-government at the grass-roots level are special legal persons.

name: Article 76 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the construction works are supervised, the subcontractor shall enter into a contract in writing with the overseer. The rights and obligations of the subcontractor and the overseer, as well as their legal liability, shall be in accordance with the terms of this contract and other relevant laws and administrative regulations.
text:
Name:Article 76 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the construction works are supervised, the subcontractor shall enter into a contract in writing with the overseer. The rights and obligations of the subcontractor and the overseer, as well as their legal liability, shall be in accordance with the terms of this contract and other relevant laws and administrative regulations.

name: Article 107 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The dissolution of an illegal organization shall be subject to liquidation in accordance with the law.
text:
Name:Article 107 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The dissolution of an illegal organization shall be subject to liquidation in accordance with the law.

name: Article 76 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Legal persons established for the purpose of obtaining profits and allocating funds, such as shareholders, are legal persons for profit.
text:

name: Article 1006 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A civil legal act committed by one of the spouses as a result of the daily life of the family shall have effect on both spouses, unless otherwise agreed between one of the spouses and the counterparty.
text:
Name:Article 1006 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A civil legal act committed by one of the spouses as a result of the daily life of the family shall have effect on both spouses, unless otherwise agreed between one of the spouses and the counterparty.

name: Article 609 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the seller has not delivered the documents and information relating to the subject matter as agreed, this does not affect the damage to the subject matter or the transfer of the risk of loss.
text:
Name:Article 609 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the seller has not delivered the documents and information relating to the subject matter as agreed, this does not affect the damage to the subject matter or the transfer of the risk of loss.

name: Article 10,027 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the object of the author ' s literary or artistic production is to be described by the true person or by a particular person, and if it contains insults or slanderous content that infringes the right of others to honour, the victim has the right, in accordance with the law, to request civil liability of the perpetrator.
text:
Name:Article 10,027 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the object of the author ' s literary or artistic production is to be described by the true person or by a particular person, and if it contains insults or slanderous content that infringes the right of others to honour, the victim has the right, in accordance with the law, to request civil liability of the perpetrator.

name: Article 8113 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The passenger, shipper or consignee shall pay for the ticket or transportation costs. If the carrier does not increase the fare or transport costs by the agreed route or by the normal route, the passenger, shipper or consignee may refuse to pay the increased fare or transportation costs.
text:
Name:Article 8113 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The passenger, shipper or consignee shall pay for the ticket or transportation costs. If the carrier does not increase the fare or transport costs by the agreed route or by the normal route, the passenger, shipper or consignee may refuse to pay the increased fare or transportation costs.

name: Article 442 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In the case of bills of exchange, promissory notes, cheques, bonds, certificates of deposit, warehouse receipts, bills of lading or the date of delivery of the goods prior to the expiration of the principal claim, the bearer may cash in or take delivery of the goods and, with the agreement of the supplier, pay or deposit the price to be paid or the goods to be withdrawn.
text:
Name:Article 442 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:In the case of bills of exchange, promissory notes, cheques, bonds, certificates of deposit, warehouse receipts, bills of lading or the date of delivery of the goods prior to the expiration of the principal claim, the bearer may cash in or take delivery of the goods and, with the agreement of the supplier, pay or deposit the price to be paid or the goods to be withdrawn.

name: Article 797 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The consignor may at any time inspect the progress and quality of the operation without prejudice to the normal operations of the contractor.
text:
Name:Article 797 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The consignor may at any time inspect the progress and quality of the operation without prejudice to the normal operations of the contractor.

name: Article 295 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Real estate rights holders shall not endanger the security of adjacent real estate by excavating land, building buildings, laying pipes and installing equipment.
text:
Name:Article 295 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Real estate rights holders shall not endanger the security of adjacent real estate by excavating land, building buildings, laying pipes and installing equipment.

name: Article 126 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The subjects of civil affairs enjoy other civil rights and interests as provided for by law.
text:
Name:Article 126 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The subjects of civil affairs enjoy other civil rights and interests as provided for by law.

name: Article 16 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
During the duration of the marriage, one of the spouses may apply to the People ' s Court for the division of joint property in the following cases: 

(i) where one of the parties has committed acts that seriously impair the interests of the couple ' s common property, such as concealment, transfer, sale, destruction, squandering of the couple ' s common property or falsifying the couple ' s joint debt; 

(ii) where a person with legal maintenance obligations of one of the parties is suffering from a serious illness requiring medical treatment and the other does not agree to pay the related medical expenses. 


(ii)
text:
Name:Article 16 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:During the duration of the marriage, one of the spouses may apply to the People ' s Court for the division of joint property in the following cases: 

(i) where one of the parties has committed acts that seriously impair the interests of the couple ' s common property, such as concealment, transfer, sale, destruction, squandering of the couple ' s common property or falsifying the couple ' s joint debt; 

(ii) where a person with legal maintenance obligations of one of the parties is suffering from a serious illness requiring medical treatment and the other does not agree to pay the related medical expenses. 


(ii)

name: Article 190 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A person with full civil capacity shall be liable for tort if he has made a mistake in causing harm to another person by temporarily unconsciousness or loss of control of his conduct; if he has not done so, the victim shall be adequately compensated according to the financial situation of the perpetrator; a person with full civil capacity shall be liable for tort if he has temporarily been unaware of his conduct or if he has suffered harm as a result of his intoxication, abuse of narcotic drugs or psychopharmaceuticals.
text:
Name:Article 190 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A person with full civil capacity shall be liable for tort if he has made a mistake in causing harm to another person by temporarily unconsciousness or loss of control of his conduct; if he has not done so, the victim shall be adequately compensated according to the financial situation of the perpetrator; a person with full civil capacity shall be liable for tort if he has temporarily been unaware of his conduct or if he has suffered harm as a result of his intoxication, abuse of narcotic drugs or psychopharmaceuticals.

name: Article 9112 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The custodian shall notify the inventory holder or the holder of the warehouse receipt in a timely manner if it finds that the contents of the warehouse have been altered or otherwise damaged.
text:
Name:Article 9112 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The custodian shall notify the inventory holder or the holder of the warehouse receipt in a timely manner if it finds that the contents of the warehouse have been altered or otherwise damaged.

name: Article 13 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A natural person, from birth until death, has civil capacity and, in accordance with the law, civil rights and obligations.
text:
Name:Article 13 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A natural person, from birth until death, has civil capacity and, in accordance with the law, civil rights and obligations.

name: Article 577 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If a party fails to perform its contractual obligations or if performance of its contractual obligations is not in conformity with the agreement, it shall be liable for breach of contract, such as continuation of performance, remedy or compensation for loss.
text:
Name:Article 577 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If a party fails to perform its contractual obligations or if performance of its contractual obligations is not in conformity with the agreement, it shall be liable for breach of contract, such as continuation of performance, remedy or compensation for loss.

name: Article 932 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Two or more trustees are jointly and severally liable to the principal.
text:
Name:Article 932 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Two or more trustees are jointly and severally liable to the principal.

name: Article 11,160 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The heritage of the uninherited and uninherited is owned by the State for the benefit of the public; the deceased was a member of the collective ownership organization to which he belongs.

Name:Article 11,160 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:The heritage of the uninherited and uninherited is owned by the State for the benefit of the public; the deceased was a member of the collective ownership organization to which he belongs.

name: Article 170 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A person who performs the work of a legal person or an illegal person organization shall have effect on a legal person or an illegal person organization in respect of a civil act performed in the name of a legal person or an illegal person organization in respect of matters within its competence.
text:

name: Article 12,111 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Motor vehicles engaged in road transport operations in the form of attachments, causing damage in the event of a traffic accident, are the responsibility of the motor vehicle side and are jointly and severally liable of the person to whom they are placed.

name: Article 898 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In the case of money, securities or other valuables deposited with the depositary, a declaration shall be made to the depositary that they will be received or sealed by the depositary; in the event of loss or loss of the goods, the depositary may reimburse the depositary in accordance with the general article.

name: Article 159 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A conditioned civil legal act is deemed to have been achieved if the person improperly prevents the condition accomplishment in his own interest; if the condition has been improperly contributed to the achievement, the condition is considered not to have been achieved.
text:
Name:Article 159 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A conditioned civil legal act is deemed to have been achieved if the person improperly prevents the condition accomplishment in his own interest; if the condition has been improperly contributed to the achievement, the condition is considered not to have been achieved.

name: Article 288 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Neighbors of immovable property shall be treated correctly in accordance with the principles of production, convenience, solidarity and equity.
text:
Name:Article 288 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Neighbors of immovable property shall be treated correctly in accordance with the principles of production, convenience, solidarity and equity.

name: Article 75 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The lessor is entitled to claim compensation for the loss of the lessee if the financial lease contract is discharged, recognized as invalid or avoided by reason of the sale contract, and the seller or lease is chosen by the lessee; unless, for reasons of the lessor, the contract of sale is discharged, confirmed null and void or avoided. 
 
 The lessee is no longer liable if the loss has been compensated at the time the contract of sale was discharged, confirmed null and void or avoided. 
 
 \

 The lessee is no longer liable if the loss has been compensated at the time the contract of sale was discharged, confirmed null and void or avoided. 
 
 \

name: Article 1552 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China

text:

name: Article 17 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Animal breeders or managers should be held liable for torts if dangerous animals, such as strong dogs, are prohibited from breeding and causing harm to others.
text:
Name:Article 17 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China

name: Article 226 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Before the creation and transfer of property rights in movable property, the right in rem becomes effective upon the entry into force of a civil law act if the right holder has taken possession of the movable property.
text:
Name:Article 226 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Before the creation and transfer of property rights in movable property, the right in rem becomes effective upon the entry into force of a civil law act if the right holder has taken possession of the movable property.

name: Article 12,445 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Tortual liability shall be borne by the animal breeder or administrator if the animal that is raised causes damage to others; however, it can be proved that the damage was caused by wilful or gross negligence on the part of the person to whom the violation was committed, and the liability may not be incurred or mitigated.
text:
Name:Article 12,445 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Tortual liability shall be borne by the animal breeder or administrator if the animal that is raised causes damage to others; however, it can be proved that the damage was caused by wilful or gross negligence on the part of the person to whom the violation was committed, and the liability may not be incurred or mitigated.

name: Article 166 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In the case of several persons acting on the same behalf, the right to represent shall be exercised jointly, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.
text:
Name:Article 166 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:In the case of several persons acting on the same behalf, the right to represent shall be exercised jointly, unless otherwise agreed by the parties.

name: Article 90 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A public association established on the basis of the common will of its members for a non-profit purpose, such as the public good or the common interest of its members, is registered by law and acquires the legal personality of a public association; it is not required by law to register a legal person and, from the date of its establishment, it has the legal personality of a public association.
text:
Name:Article 90 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:A public association established on the basis of the common will of its members for a non-profit purpose, such as the public good or the common interest of its members, is registered by law and acquires the legal personality of a public association; it is not required by law to register a legal person and, from the date of its establishment, it has the legal personality of a public association.

name: Article 746 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Rent under a financial lease contract, unless otherwise agreed by the parties, shall be determined on the basis of most or all of the cost of the purchase of the lease and the reasonable profit of the lessor.
text:
Name:Article 746 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Rent under a financial lease contract, unless otherwise agreed by the parties, shall be determined on the basis of most or all of the cost of the purchase of the lease and the reasonable profit of the lessor.

name: Article 392 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Where the secured claim is secured by both security and security for a person, the creditor should realize the claim as agreed if the debtor fails to perform the mature debt or if the parties agree to realize the security right; if there is no agreement or agreement that the debtor itself provides security, the creditor should realize the claim with security for the goods; if the third party provides security, the creditor may realize the claim with security for the goods or request the guarantor to assume responsibility for the security. The third party providing the security is entitled to recovery from the debtor after assuming responsibility for the security.
text:
Name:Article 392 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:Where the secured claim is secured by both security and security for a person, the creditor should realize the claim as agreed if the debtor fails to perform the mature debt or if the parties agree to realize the security right; if there is no agreement or agreement that the debtor itself provides security, the creditor should realize the claim with security for the goods; if the third party provides security, the creditor may realize the claim with security for the goods or request the guarantor to assume responsibility for the security. The third party providing the security is entitled to recovery from the debtor after assuming responsibility for the security.

name: Article 359 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If the right to use land for the construction of a dwelling has expired, it is automatically renewed. The payment or relief of the payment of a renewal fee is done in accordance with the provisions of the law and the administrative regulations.
text:
Name:Article 359 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Content:If the right to use land for the construction of a dwelling has expired, it is automatically renewed. The payment or relief of the payment of a renewal fee is done in accordance with the provisions of the law and the administrative regulations.

name: Article 559 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: When the debt of the claim is terminated, the claim is extinguished at the same time, unless otherwise provided by law or otherwise agreed by the parties.
text:

name: Article 1001 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The protection of the identity rights of natural persons arising from, inter alia, marital and family relations is governed by the relevant provisions of Parts I, V and other laws of this Act; where they are not, the provisions of this Title may be taken into account by reference to their nature.

name: Article 137 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
An expression expressed in the form of a dialogue means that the relative is aware of its content. 

 means a non-dialogue means that it becomes effective when the counterparty arrives. A non-dialogue means that, if the relative designates a particular system to receive the data message, the data message becomes effective when the person enters the particular system; if the relative knows or should have known that the data message enters its system, the parties agree otherwise on the time of effectiveness when the data message is meant to be in the form of the data message, as agreed by the parties.

 means a non-dialogue means that it becomes effective when the counterparty arrives. content: If the perpetrator fails to assume the civil liability provided for in the preceding paragraph, the people ' s court may impose the costs incurred by the perpetrator by issuing a notice in the press, the Internet, etc., or by publishing a decision in force.

name: Article 307 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: In external relations, the co-owner is entitled to joint and several claims, unless otherwise provided by law or if a third person knows that the co-owner does not have a joint and several debt relationship; in intra-owner relations, the co-owner has a share of the claim, a share of the debt, and the co-owner has a joint claim and a share of the debt, unless otherwise agreed by the co-owner.
text:

name: Article 432 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:

name: Article 11,83 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The aggrieved person has the right to apply for moral damages in the case of serious moral damage caused by the infringement of the personal rights and interests of a natural person. 
 
 The aggrieved person has the right to apply for moral damages in the case of serious moral damage caused by intentional or gross negligence against a particular object of personal significance of a natural person. 
 
 \

name: Article 486 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A new offer is made if the offeree makes a promise beyond the promise period or if the promise is made within the commitment period and, as a rule, fails to arrive at the offeree in a timely manner; unless the offeror notifies the offeree in a timely manner that the promise is valid.

name: Article 697 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The creditor, without the written consent of the guarantor, permits the debtor to transfer all or part of the debt and the guarantor is no longer liable for the obligation transferred without its consent, unless otherwise agreed between the creditor and the guarantor.
text:

text:

name: Article 278 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
Article 469 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The parties may enter into a contract in writing, orally or otherwise. 
 
 Written form is the form in which the contents of the contract, letters, telegrams, telexes, faxes, etc. may be expressed in a tangible manner. 
 Electronic data interchange (EDI), electronic mail, etc., can be expressed in a tangible manner and data messages that are readily accessible are deemed to be in writing.

 Electronic data interchange (EDI), electronic mail, etc., can be expressed in a tangible manner and data messages that are readily accessible are deemed to be in writing.

name: Article 1053 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: If one of the parties suffers from a serious illness, the other party shall be duly informed before the marriage is registered; rather than so informed, the other party may apply to the People's Court for annulment of the marriage.

name: Article 828 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
If the shipper delivers dangerous goods such as flammable, explosive, toxic, corrosive, radioactive or other goods, the shipper shall properly package the dangerous goods, mark and label them in accordance with the national requirements for the transport of dangerous goods and submit to the carrier written information on the name, nature and precautions of the dangerous goods. 
 
 \ the shipper may refuse to transport or take measures to avoid loss, and the costs incurred are therefore borne by the shipper. 
 \

name: Article 388 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
A security right shall be created in accordance with the provisions of this Law and other laws. A security contract includes a mortgage contract, a pledge contract and other contracts with security functions. A security contract is a contract from which the principal claim is owed. If the contract for the principal claim is invalid, the security contract is void, except as otherwise provided by law. 
 
 The debtor, guarantor, and creditors who have made a mistake upon confirmation of the security contract shall be subject to their respective civil liability on the basis of their fault.

name: Article 680 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: Interest lending is prohibited, and the interest rate of the loan cannot be in violation of the relevant national regulations. If the loan contract does not agree on the payment of interest, it is deemed to have no interest. If the agreement on the payment of interest is unclear, the parties are unable to reach a supplementary agreement, interest is determined on the basis of such factors as local or party mode of dealing, business habits, market interest rates, etc.; if the loan is made between natural persons, it is considered to have no interest.

name: Article 793 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The construction work contract is not valid, but the construction work experience is qualified to compensate the contractor by reference to the agreed discount on the price of the work. 

 the construction work contract is invalid and the construction work experience is not qualified, as follows: 

 (i) the construction work experience after repair is qualified and the contractor may request the contractor to bear the cost of repair; 
 (ii) the construction experience after restoration is not qualified and the contractor is not entitled to claim compensation for the agreed discount on the price of the work under the contract. 

 the contractor is liable for any loss caused by the non-conformity of the construction work.

name: Article 453 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The retentionist and the debtor shall agree on the period of performance of the obligation after the retention of the property; in the absence of agreement or uncertainty, the retentionist shall give the debtor a period of more than sixty days for the performance of the obligation, with the exception of movable property that is not easy to keep, such as living and perishable. If the debtor is late in performance, the retentionist may agree with the debtor to exchange the retention of the property or, in the case of the sale of the property, give priority to the payment of the price resulting from the auction or sale of the retention of the property. \n \n the discount or sale of the lien property shall be taken into account by reference to the market price.

If the debtor is late in performance, the retentionist may agree with the debtor to exchange the retention of the property or, in the case of the sale of the property, give priority to the payment of the price resulting from the auction or sale of the retention of the property. \n \n the discount or sale of the lien property shall be taken into account by reference to the market price.

name: Article 435 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The guarantor may waive the right to security. If the debtor has given good faith in its own property and the guarantor has given up that right, the other guarantor is relieved of its responsibility to the extent that the grantor loses a priority interest, unless the other guarantor undertakes to continue providing security.

name: Article 106 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: A person with full civil capacity shall have the right to make a free donation of human cells, tissues, organs, and human remains in accordance with the law. No organization or individual shall be compelled, deceived or induced to do so. If a person with full civil capacity consents to do so in accordance with the preceding paragraph, it shall be in writing or a will may be made.

name: Article 692 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The guarantee period is the period during which the guarantor is established to be liable and there is no suspension, interruption or extension. 
 
 creditors and guarantors may agree on the guarantee period, but an agreed guarantee period that is earlier than the period for performance of the principal obligation or expires at the same time as the period for performance of the main obligation is deemed not to have been agreed; if there is no agreement or agreement that the guarantee period is six months from the expiration of the period for performance of the main obligation. 
 
 Creditors and the debtor have not agreed or have not agreed on the period for performance of the principal obligation, the guarantee period is calculated from the date of expiration of the grace period for which the creditor requests the debtor to perform the obligation.

name: Article 1143 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content:
The will of an incompetent person or of a person limiting his or her civil capacity is invalid. 

 
 will must state the true meaning of the will, and the will made under fraud or duress shall be invalid. 
 
 
 
 a forged will shall be invalid. 
 
 
 the will is altered and the contents of the altered will shall be invalid.

content:
The buyer of the probationary sale may or may refuse to purchase the subject matter during the probationary period. Upon expiry of the probationary period, the buyer does not indicate whether or not to purchase the subject matter is deemed to be the purchase. 
 
 the buyer of the probationary sale has already paid part of the price during the probationary period or the sale, lease, creation of security rights, etc. in respect of the subject matter is deemed to have consented to the purchase.

Compensation or compensation shall be paid for damage caused to the other party as a result of the fault of one of the parties or the determination of the attribution of the goods.

name: Article 4.8 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The mortgager has the right to request the mortgager to cease his/her actions if his/her actions are sufficient to reduce the value of the mortgaged property; if the mortgager has reduced the value of the mortgage, the mortgager has the right to request the restoration of the value of the mortgaged property or to provide security corresponding to the reduced value. If the mortgager does not restore the value of the mortgaged property or does not provide security, the mortgager has the right to request the debtor to settle the debt in advance.

name: Article 970 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The partnership shall be executed jointly by all the partners, unless otherwise agreed by the partners. Under the terms of the partnership agreement or the decision of all the partners, one or more partners may be entrusted with the partnership; the other partners may no longer carry out the partnership but have the authority to monitor the implementation.

name: Article 923 of the Civil Code of the People ' s Republic of China
content: The trustee shall deal with the commission in person. With the consent of the client, the trustee may transfer the trust. If the transfer is made, the trustee may direct a third person in respect of the commission, and the trustee may assume responsibility only for the selection of the third person and his instructions to the third person. If the transfer is made without consent or recourse, the trustee shall be liable for the conduct of the third person in respect of the transfer; except in emergency cases where the trustee is required to transfer the trust in the interests of the client.

If the transfer is made without consent or recourse, the trustee shall be liable for the conduct of the third person in respect of the transfer; except in emergency cases where the trustee is required to transfer the trust in the interests of the client.
